page.title: 11EDUCATION IN FERNESS
page.content: There are no nursery schools or playgroups in the Ferness area. At the age of 4-5 yrs children may enrol at the local village school. This is a single-teacher school with a current roll of 11 children. The children remain at the primary school until the age of 11-12 yrs when they transfer to Nairn Academy - 11 miles to the north. Primary children are brought to the school by car - the furthest pupil comes about 5 miles. School dinners are cooked on the premises in the fully equipped kitchen and most children take advantage of this facility. Secondary school children gather to meet the school bus at 8am in Ferness village and are returned there at about 4:30pm. The nearest colleges are in Inverness or Elgin & Aberdeen has the nearest university.
